DataElement.preferredName: Childhood Cancer Registry Research Consent Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no/unknown/not applicable indicator related to the agreement to allow Children Cancer Registry collecting information to establish facts.  Childhood Cancer Registry, a North American pediatric cancer research registry established by the Children's Oncology Group for member institutions in the United States and Canada. It provides a centralized pediatric cancer research registry for investigators conducting epidemiology, biology, late effects, and cancer control studies.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did parent/guardian agree to be in the Childhood Cancer Registry and allow us to collect basic information about them that will help researchers better understand childhood cancers?
